Description:
Welcome to Up and Around! This is a Battlegrounds inspired map in which you have to go Up the Wall and Around the ceiling in order to score.


Gameplay:
This is standard map gameplay, two goals and a ball. You have to go up the wall in order to get to the goal. It's very hard to do, but air dribbles and pinches are your friend.


Mutators:
None
Super Boomer recommended for a faster paced game



GLHF!
